parameters.text:
=Create a unique and engaging Instagram post about Pathvancer, a company that builds AI automation agents. Your response should be in the following format, without adding any extra explanation or JSON prefix:

{
"title": "PLACEHOLDER",
"caption": "PLACEHOLDER"
}

The title should be strong and attention-grabbing, setting the stage for the post. The caption should:
✅ Start with an engaging hook.
✅ Include brief storytelling or industry insight (how Pathvancer solves a real problem or aligns with AI trends).
✅ Clearly mention benefits and value Pathvancer brings.
✅ End with a thought-provoking question or call to action to boost engagement.
✅ Stay within 500 characters.
✅ Avoid including any links.
✅ Use a professional yet conversational tone.
✅ Include 3–5 relevant industry hashtags such as #AIautomation #NoCodeAI #FutureOfWork

Do not include quotation marks around the title or caption values. Only return the raw data in the specified JSON format, enclosed in curly braces.
